summary: This is the Chinese translated version of the original ACE - Combat Skills  mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original ACE - Combat Skills  mod. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037
All credit to the original author Athyra.

Introduction
ACE is a collection of mods which can be run independently of each other.
ACE aspires to brings more depth and balance Skyrim while maintaining its original feel.
It does so by adding depth to the skill trees and adding new functionality.

For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.

Installation
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with Athyra, thank him for this great MOD!
If you like this MOD, please endorse the author and vote for it, thank you!

About our group
DRAGON SLAYER MOD TEAMâ„¢ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: dsmod@yahoo.cn
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: Athyra
